effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: Coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.
